entity.name: The Dr. Oz Show
entity.description: After five years as a health expert on "The Oprah Winfrey Show," Dr. Mehmet Oz gets an hour of his own each weekday to discuss viewers' health-and-wellness concerns. No subject is off-limits, as Dr. Oz addresses viewers' questions and talks to health experts about any and all topics, from sex to diet and exercise to diseases and ways to avoid them.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DrOz So Repubs want to protect the unborn at all costs yet it’s acceptable to write off 2-3 % of our kids? Let the old folks die? All to protect an economy where the rich get richer, the poor get poorer & the middle guy gets the shaft. Not sure which  is more dangerous Fox or COVID19.
